API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.bounds.BBox

type
class
version
3.1
The BBox class is used to quickly and easily clip an object in a 3D scene.

It creates a bounding box that contains the whole object.

Static Variables

create(default,method) : p_aVertices : Array<sandy.core.data.Vertex> -> BBox

Creates a bounding box that encloses a 3D from an Array of the object's vertices.

Constructor

new()
parameters
p_min Min vector, representing the lower point of the cube volume
p_max Max vector, representing the upper point of the cube volume
Creates a new BBox instance by passing the min and the max Point3D.

Instance Variables

addInternalPoint(default,method) : p_oPoint : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> Void

addInternalPointXYZ(default,method) : x : Float -> y : Float -> z : Float -> Void

clone(default,method) : Void -> BBox

Returns a new BBox object that is a clone of the original instance.

copy(default,method) : p_oBBox : BBox -> Void

Makes this BBox a copy of the specified BBox.

All elements of this BBox are set to those of the argument BBox

getCenter(default,method) : Void -> sandy.core.data.Point3D

Returns the center of the bounding box volume.

getDepth(inline,null) : Void -> Float

Returns the depth (Z) of this box

getEdges(default,method) : edges : sandy.TypedArray<sandy.core.data.Point3D> -> Void

getHeight(inline,null) : Void -> Float

Returns the height (Y) of this box

getSize(default,method) : Void -> sandy.core.data.Point3D

Return the size of the Bounding Box.

getWidth(inline,null) : Void -> Float

Returns the width (X) of this box

intersectsBox(default,method) : box : BBox -> Bool

isPointInsideXYZ(default,method) : x : Float -> y : Float -> z : Float -> Bool

isPointTotalInside(default,method) : p_oPoint : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> Bool

maxEdge : sandy.core.data.Point3D

A Point3D representing the highest point of the cube volume.

merge(default,method) : box : BBox -> Void

Merge the current BoundingBox with the one given in argument

minEdge : sandy.core.data.Point3D

A Point3D representing the lowest point of the cube volume.

movedTo(default,method) : pos : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> BBox

Returns a new bounding box based on this one that has been 'moved' to the position pos.

movedToXYZ(default,method) : p_fX : Float -> p_fY : Float -> p_fZ : Float -> BBox

Returns a new bounding box based on this one that has been 'moved' to the position pos

reset(default,method) : Void -> Void

Reset the current bounding box to an empoty box with 0,0,0 as max and min values

toString(default,method) : ?decPlaces : Int -> String

Returns a String representation of the BBox.

transform(default,method) : p_oMatrix : sandy.core.data.Matrix4 -> BBox

Applies a transformation to the bounding box.

uptodate : Bool

Specifies if this object's boundaries are up to date with the object it is enclosing. If false, this object's transform() method must be called to get its updated boundaries in the current frame.
